name: XinasRitual
description:
Hi and welcome. 

This is my very first Gamejam "Godot Wild Jam # 50". This is also my very first game that has a beginning and end after a few projects tinkering with ideas.

Based on the theme "Ritual", you must pay your debt by performing the blood ritual! 

I hope you like it! 

Credits to: Clembod, LuizMelo, Kenney's Graveyard Kit, Music; Gigakoops
